alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 10:02PM CDT until September 07 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greeley County in central Nebraska... Western Nance County in central Nebraska... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1001 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Loup, or 10 miles east of Ord, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station at Ord reported 78 MPH winds at 944 PM. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Greeley around 1010 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
